title: Mesopotamia: Sumer, Akkad, Babylon, Assyria, Persia
description: Discover the cradle of civilization, its pioneering city-states, advancements in writing, law, and the rise and fall of its mighty empires.

title: Ancient Egypt: Old, Middle, New Kingdoms, hieroglyphs, mummification, pyramids
description: Journey along the Nile, delving into the mysteries of pharaohs, monumental architecture, and a civilization that lasted millennia.

title: Ancient China: Xia, Shang, Zhou, Qin, Han dynasties
description: Traverse China's ancient past, from its earliest dynasties to the establishment of its imperial system and early technological innovations.

title: Indus Valley Civilization and Vedic Period
description: Unearth the secrets of the enigmatic Indus Valley cities and delve into the Vedic period's foundational texts and beliefs.

title: Ancient Greece: Minoans, Mycenaeans, Classical Greece, Hellenistic era
description: Explore the birthplace of Western culture, its philosophical, artistic, and political innovations, and the legacy of its empires.

title: Roman Empire: Republic, Imperial era, decline
description: Relive the glory of Rome, its foundational republic, sprawling empire, monumental achievements, and its eventual decline.
